§ Lupa Varka

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

In the [[world-18]] //animation// and //fictional world//, **Lupa V⁠arka** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

**Lupa Varka** lives in the village of [[seyawt]] on planet [[kemeta]].

The village of [[seyawt]], that she lives in, has a long history of revering, exalting, and even worshipping [[upuat]].
But her family also has a historical connection with the deity [[upuat]]. 

§§ Family

**Lupa Varka** is the daughter of [[gorg-⁠varka]].

And is the adopted sister of [[zoon]] adopted **Lupa** acts more like a mother-figure to [[zoon]].

The **Grand Master** [[jangshah]] (who she trains with) is her //maternal grandfather//.
